content.description:
Scientists collected data for 35 years on the populations of mice and owls in a given area.
 Year Owl Population Size Number of Live Births in Mouse Population Number of Deaths in Mouse Population 1985 2 800 200 1990 8 800 300 1995 30 400 500 2000 10 650 475 2005 14 625 625 2010 15 650 550 2015 16 575 550 2020 8 725 450
content.question: Based on the trends shown in the table, in which of the following years was the owl population at carrying capacity?

skill.text: Skill 5.E: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about environmental issues.
